name: BUDDY
description: BUDDY is a horror adventure based on a little girl Mary’s story nightmare. Will you able to distinguish the real story from the girl's fantasy?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 950 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I love this games old school horror film it has very unique feel. I would recommend this game to others who are looking for a unique game like Buddy. Check out my let's play of Buddy.         YouTube™ Video:  STUCK IN A NIGHTMEOW 'BUDDY' - Episode 1 - ReflectoMist
